    • Constructor Detail

      • Food

        public Food(java.lang.String name,
            char displayChar,
            Food.FoodType initFoodType,
            int initFoodValue,
            int initSellValue,
            int initBuyValue)
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the food
        displayChar - Display Character when it is on the ground
        initFoodType - Enum to determine whether food is Carnivore or Herbivore food
        initFoodValue - The amount of hunger it will replenish when it is eaten
        initSellValue - How much the food sells for
        initBuyValue - How much the food costs to buy
